message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. Given its significance and worth to me, I believe it would also be a great addition to your collection or business. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the details.
